MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G33 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:00am. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:20am on Friday, 05 February 2021
